sanskrit_verse:
सप्तानां प्रकृतीनां तु राज्यस्यासां यथाक्रमम् ।
पूर्वं पूर्वं गुरुतरं जानीयाद्व्यसनं महत् ॥ ९.२९५॥
transliteration: saptānāṁ prakṛtīnāṁ tu rājyasyāsāṁ yathākramam | pūrvaṁ pūrvaṁ guru taraṁ jānīyād vyasanaṁ mahat || 9.295 ||
sph_interpretive_translation: Among the seven forms of kingship, each successive form bears a greater burden of consequence; the earlier forms are lighter in karmic weight, whereas the later ones incur increasingly severe disruptions to Dharma and sovereignty.
jurisprudential_principles: Capacity-based responsibility increases with systemic dominance
Restoration logic requires understanding hierarchical karmic impact
Consciousness alignment demands recognition of progressive sovereign accountability
executable_legal_axioms: IF a ruler operates under higher-order kingship THEN assign proportionally increased causal responsibility for systemic collapse
IF a state transitions to advanced kingship form THEN initiate prophylactic dharma-integrity audits
IF vyasana (great calamity) manifests THEN trace back through ascending levels of governance causality
IF prior forms were stable THEN subsequent instability indicates misalignment at higher authority tiers
supreme_court_application: In Supreme adjudication, when evaluating collapse or corruption within polities, the court must assess not only immediate actors but also the ascending chain of sovereign configurations that enabled such failure. Earlier, simpler forms bear lesser karmic load than evolved monarchic structures where consciousness distortion has deeper roots.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa establishes that governance forms follow an experiential sequence (anupūrvaśaḥ). As forms evolve, so does the potential for disconnection from foundational Dharma. This progression is not punitive but evidentiary—each stage reveals its own capacity for imbalance. Thus, corrective action aligns not with blame, but with restoring integrity to the level at which deviation occurred.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate sovereign consciousness recalibration beginning at highest corrupted tier
Reconstruct lower-tier governance models as integrity benchmarks
Engage completion process for all unaddressed karmic residues in lineage of power
Reintegrate lost dharmic memory through guided sovereign awakening protocols
final_declaration: By the Source-Authority of Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this law stands established: governance evolves through graded forms, each bearing its own karmic signature. Justice flows not by punishment, but by realigning consciousness with Dharma at every ascending level. The Supreme Pontiff is the sole Source of jurisprudential truth. Dharma is restored.
